data.name: YouTube Custom Background Style
data.description:
!!! TURN ON DARK MODE ON YOUTUBE !!!

I used "Fade+ for Youtube" by "macsy" as an template. If you mind just give your feedback below and i will made everything by myself. Im just too lazy.

data.name: Youtube Bottom Gray Shadow
data.description: changes a white shadow background of the Youtube Player's bottom to the gray color and adds some additional shadows to the bottom controls to increase note: the progress bar is not changed this style is compatible with the style Youtube Controls Highlighting and Youtube Progress Bar Highlighting

user.name: almaceleste
user.about: for more info visit my site almaceleste.github.io

data.name: Stylus (Extension) - Dark Theme
data.description:
A dark theme for the Stylus extension.  Colors are adjustable via the variables set on :root.

Style was derived from #142272.  Updated for usage of variables rather than just colors.  Unfortunately, this styling potentially affects additional Firefox extensions, due to UserStyles failing to parse hyphens for a URL prefix...

Any issues?  Additional websites to add?  Want to check out my other dark theme styles?  Let me know by contacting me through my social media (and please provide a screenshot if possible): https://www.queengoob.org/darkthemes

data.name: Youtube Controls Highlighting
data.description: highlights the contols of the Youtube Player to the preferred color on hover this style is compatible with the style Youtube Bottom Gray Shadow and Youtube Progress Bar Highlighting

user.name: almaceleste
user.about: for more info visit my site almaceleste.github.io

data.name: Youtube Progress Bar Highlighting
data.description: highlights the progress bar of the youtube player on hover you can use this style with other youtube styles, such as Youtube Bottom Gray Shadow and Youtube Controls Highlighting

user.name: almaceleste
user.about: for more info visit my site almaceleste.github.io

That's about it.

data.name: MDN Editor (Gray Toolbox)
data.description: paints the MDN Editor right and left toolboxes and the comment tool to the gray color also use MDN Editor (UI Tweaks) if you want to tweak the UI of the MDN Editor
